column15: Estimate based on estimated influent flow. Averaged annual consumption of water usage (using winter months). Oct. 1/17 thru Mar.31/18 = 18,513.69m3 x2 to get 12 months = 37,027.38m3/365 days = 101.44m3/day. Also calculated Oct. 1/16 thru Mar.31/17 with result of 111.95m3. Averaged both results: 101.44m3 + 111.95m3 = 213.39m3 /2 = 106.7m3.

column15: Determined the mean combined averages of measured daily reverse osmosis wastewater effluent plus measured municipal sewage effluent from water plant and sewage lift station, respectively over 3 years. Adjusted this influent to the lagoons for annual net evaporation loss and actual discharge periods normalized to report an annual average daily effluent volume of 1213 cubic metres.
